title: Roky Erickson - Demon/Angel - 1998 Version
description: Roky Erickson - 1984-10-31, Demon/Angel - A Day And Night With Roky Erickson - 1998 version, 61:21, ROK DVD 12 This 1998 version of Demon Angel features different camera angles & edits, several interviews and a complete Right Track Now. The interviews appear to be from ~1994-95 "Where the Pyramid Meets the Eye" Tribute release related and include: Bill Bentley, Evelyn Erickson, Sumner Erickson, Mike Jensen, Bill Miller & Jack Ortman. Video: Commercial VHS > Panasonic AG-DS555P > S-video cable > Pioneer DVR-533H-S DVR (LPCM mode) Audio: Commercial VHS > Panasonic AG-DS555P > Zoom H1 > Wav (48kHz/24bit) > minor edits & dither to 16bit in iZotope > mux with video in DVD Studio Pro > DVD 1) Mike Alvarez 2) ...Splash 1 3) Bill Bentley 4) Cold Night For Alligators 5) Bill Miller / Bill Bentley / Jack Ortman / Mike Jensen 6) ...You’re Gonna Miss Me 7) Bill Bentley / Jack Ortman / Evelyn Erickson 8) Roky 9) The Damn' Thing 10) Evelyn / Sumner Erickson 11) Roky 12) White Faces 13) Jack Ortman / Bill Miller / Sumner Erickson 14) Bloody Hammer 15) Sumner Erickson / Bill Miller 16) Roky 17) ...Two Headed Dog 18) Roky 19) Right Track Now (complete!) 20) Mike Jensen / Bill Miller 21) Roky 22) ...Hungry For Love 23) Roky 24) Night Of The Vampire 25) Bill Miller 26) Roky 27) Stand For The Fire Demon 28) Bill Bentley / Jack Ortman / Sumner Erickson / Mike Jensen 29) Starry Eyes A LewsiVer/Pschnob Production For more information please Visit us at: Http://www.texaspsychedelicrock.com Http://groups.google.com/group/Texas-P
